The NSC-R Tidy Tuesday workshop sessions are inspired by the [Tidy Tuesday](https://www.tidytuesday.com/) initiative, which was aimed at providing a safe and supportive forum for individuals to practice their data processing and visualization skills in R while working with real-world data.

Join this workshop meeting on Zoom by clicking [this link](https://us02web.zoom.us/j/82954366080?pwd=bzdpSzRkNktzVkZSOEdNUTlSdTNmdz09)



> **Asier Moneva** is a postdoc at the NSCR and The Hague University of Applied Sciences with a background in criminology. He started specializing in crime analysis with R during his master's degree and has since developed an interest in open science.
